meanings.definition: The practice of granting a franchise to a business
meanings.sent1: Franchising allows a company to expand by giving others the right to use its name and business model.
meanings.sent2: Many successful businesses grow through franchising, such as fast-food chains.
meanings.sent3: The idea of franchising is like sharing a secret recipe for business success.
meanings.sent4: Franchising is like planting seeds of a business in different locations to watch them grow.
meanings.sent5: The concept of franchising is like building a network of business partners across the country.

meanings.definition: The act of operating a business under a franchise agreement
meanings.sent1: After signing the franchising agreement, she began running her own store with the support of the main company.
meanings.sent2: Franchising involves following specific rules set by the franchisor to maintain brand consistency.
meanings.sent3: He joked that franchising was like being part of a business family with rules to follow.
meanings.sent4: In a way, franchising is like being the captain of a ship, steering the business towards success.
meanings.sent5: The world of franchising is like a puzzle where each piece represents a different aspect of the business.

meanings.definition: A method of expanding a business through licensing agreements
meanings.sent1: Franchising allows a company to grow without directly managing all the new locations.
meanings.sent2: Successful franchising requires finding the right partners who understand the brand.
meanings.sent3: She compared franchising to a game of chess, strategically placing pieces to conquer new territories.
meanings.sent4: Franchising is like a bridge connecting the main company to new markets and customers.
meanings.sent5: The art of franchising is like painting a masterpiece, with each location adding a unique color to the canvas.
